content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's my pleasure to show you the apartment. I'm sure you'll find it to be a great place to live. So, what price were you considering for the rental?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I am a student so I am looking for a good deal. I would say 300 euros per month would be a good price for this apartment.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm sorry, but 300 euros per month is much lower than what I was expecting. The location and the quality of the apartment justify a higher price. How about 500 euros per month? It's a fair price for the amenities and the central location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That is a big difference. Let me think of a compromise. How about 400 euros per month?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: 400 euros per month is still lower than what I had in mind. I'm looking for a tenant who values the convenience and quality of this apartment. 500 euros per month is a reasonable price for the location and the facilities provided. Would you be willing to reconsider?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your point. But as a student, 500 euros per month is a high amount for me. I am willing to pay 450 euros per month. I can also sign a two-year lease.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Two-year lease sounds good, but the price of 450 euros per month is still not high enough for an apartment of this caliber in the city center. I'm looking for a tenant who can appreciate the investment they're making in a prime location. 500 euros per month is a fair price for the long-term commitment and the amenities offered. Would you be willing to meet at 475 euros per month with a two-year lease?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I can agree to the price of 475 euros per month with a two-year lease.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 475 euros per month! Great, we have a deal! Would you like to sign the lease now?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Yes, I would like to sign the lease now. I am ready to move in as soon as possible.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Fantastic! I'll get the lease ready for you to sign. Once you've signed it, we can discuss any additional details, such as payment arrangements and any other responsibilities you may have as a tenant. Congratulations on finding a great apartment!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
